Comment: Wow!  Not just one, but multiple!  And she lied to the mortgage company, and to the State (or) County!    She’ll probably say “I just did what the real estate attorneys told me to do”.  Without even realizing the irony.
Author: cliffotn

Comment: This is why I always tell people to be careful cheering for screwed up enforcement of laws because while it may be someone you don't like getting hit with it today, it sets the precedent that it's ok to use against someone you like tomorrow. In this case, the libs all cheered when they hit Trump with bogus investigations and charges based on mild paperwork issues, let's see if they cheer now and still fully believe it's a good tactic now that it's one of their own in the spotlight.
Author: NyJosh
